about_the_game:
An exciting game in which you will find yourself in the role of a duck with a machine gun and will fight for your life. You will have to go through many trials and dangers to survive and become stronger.

In the game Duckiost, you control a duck that can shoot a machine gun. Your task is to fight off hunters who will try to kill you.
But not everything is so simple - the hunters will become stronger and stronger, and you will need to upgrade your machine gun to stay one step ahead.



The game controls are simple and intuitive: W, A, S, D - movement, left mouse button - shooting. You can aim and shoot in any direction, but be careful - ammo is limited
and you will have to choose carefully who to shoot at.



The main features of the game:

- Duck with a machine gun - you are not just a duck, you are a weapon capable of resisting hunters.
- Upgrade your machine gun - Upgrade your machine gun to increase its power and efficiency.
- Health system - take care of your health and try to avoid damage so as not to die.
- Intuitive controls** - Simple and intuitive controls will allow you to quickly get used to the game.


If you like run and shoot games, then Duckiost is an excellent choice.
Try your hand at being a warrior duck and see how ready you are to face the dangers!

name: Duckiost

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.6 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: An exciting game in which you will find yourself in the role of a duck with a machine gun and will fight for your life.
